Title: Leave Us Alone
Actors: Martin Højmark, Ole Meyer, Jens Wagn Rasmussen, Sven Hastel
Plot: A group from a ten to sixteen-year-old Danish educational center breaks the rules there and goes to an uninhabited island in a stolen boat. When the boat disappears, they are left to themselves, and their holiday turns into a nightmare: peer pressure, serious violence, accidents. But for some of them also an experience of love.
